text: The Whites is a 2015 detective novel written by Richard Price under the pen name Harry Brandt. The book was published on February 17, 2015. Scott Rudin is producing a film adaptation of the novel. ==Critical reception== The New York Times called The Whites "a work of reportage as much as it is a work of fiction. That’s what makes it important. It tells it like it is. It provides insight and knowledge, both rare qualities in the killing fields of the crime novel." ==References== Category:2015 American novels Category:Novels by Richard Price (writer) Category:English-language books Category:American detective novels
